Thou dost <S%H2421>give<s%> <S%H2421>life<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> of them And the <S%H8064>heavenly<s%> <S%H6635>host<s%> <S%H7812>bows<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> before Thee.

"And Thou didst <S%H1234>divide<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, So they <S%H5674>passed<s%> through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H3004>ground;<s%> And their <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> Thou didst <S%H7993>hurl<s%> into the <S%H4688>depths,<s%> <S%H3644>Like<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> into <S%H5794>raging<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

"And with a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> Thou didst <S%H5148>lead<s%> them by <S%H3119>day,<s%> And with a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> To <S%H215>light<s%> for them the <S%H1870>way<s%> In <S%H834>which<s%> they were to <S%H1980>go.<s%>

"Then Thou didst <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> And didst <S%H1696>speak<s%> with them from <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> Thou didst <S%H5414>give<s%> to them <S%H3477>just<s%> <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H8451>laws,<s%> <S%H2896>Good<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>

"So Thou didst <S%H3045>make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to them Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> And didst <S%H6680>lay<s%> <S%H6680>down<s%> for them <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H3027>Through<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

"Thou didst <S%H5414>provide<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for them for their <S%H7458>hunger,<s%> Thou didst <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from a <S%H5553>rock<s%> for them for their <S%H6772>thirst,<s%> And Thou didst <S%H559>tell<s%> them to <S%H935>enter<s%> in order to <S%H3423>possess<s%> The <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou didst <S%H5375>swear<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them.

<S%H637>"Even<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> for themselves A <S%H5695>calf<s%> of <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H4541>metal<s%> And <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>'This<s%> is your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>Who<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>' And <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H9308>blasphemies,<s%>

"And Thou didst <S%H5414>give<s%> Thy <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> to <S%H7919>instruct<s%> them, Thy <S%H4478>manna<s%> Thou didst not <S%H4513>withhold<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> And Thou didst <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H4325>water<s%> for their <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>

"Indeed, <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> Thou didst <S%H3557>provide<s%> for them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> [and] they were not in <S%H2637>want;<s%> Their <S%H8008>clothes<s%> did not <S%H1086>wear<s%> out, <S%H3808>nor<s%> did their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H1216>swell.<s%>

"And Thou didst <S%H7235>make<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7235>numerous<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> And Thou didst <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> Thou hadst <S%H559>told<s%> their fathers to <S%H1>enter<s%> and <S%H935>possess.<s%>

"So their <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%> And Thou didst <S%H3665>subdue<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> And Thou didst <S%H5414>give<s%> them into their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> with their <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> To <S%H6213>do<s%> with them as they <S%H7522>desired.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, our <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H1419>great,<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> and the <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> who dost <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> Do not let <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8513>hardship<s%> <S%H4591>seem<s%> <S%H4591>insignificant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee, <S%H834>Which<s%> has <S%H4672>come<s%> upon us, our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> our <S%H3548>priests,<s%> our <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> our fathers, and on <S%H1>all<s%> Thy <S%H3605>people,<s%> From the <S%H5971>days<s%> of the <S%H3117>kings<s%> of <S%H4428>Assyria<s%> to <S%H804>this<s%> <S%H2088>day.<s%>

"But they, in their own <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> With Thy <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou didst <S%H5414>give<s%> them, With the <S%H7342>broad<s%> and <S%H8082>rich<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou didst <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, Did not <S%H5647>serve<s%> Thee or <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4611>deeds.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> we are <S%H5650>slaves<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> And as to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou didst <S%H5414>give<s%> to our fathers to <S%H1>eat<s%> of its <S%H398>fruit<s%> and its <S%H6529>bounty,<s%> <S%H2898>Behold,<s%> we are <S%H2009>slaves<s%> on it.

"Now because of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> We are <S%H3772>making<s%> an <S%H548>agreement<s%> in <S%H3772>writing;<s%> And on the <S%H2856>sealed<s%> document [are the names of] our <S%H8269>leaders,<s%> our <S%H3881>Levites<s%> [and] our <S%H3548>priests.<s%>"
